scripts.package: tsc -p extension/ && cd extension && vsce package --no-dependencies --yarn --githubBranch main/extension
scripts.upgrade-all: printf >&2 '%s\n\t%s\n' 'Run the following command line manually:' 'yarn set version stable && yarn upgrade-packages' && false
scripts.upgrade-yarn-itself: printf >&2 '%s\n\t%s\n' 'Run the following command line manually:' 'yarn set version stable && yarn clean-install' && false
